LogUploader¶

class mnemosyne.libmnemosyne.log_uploader.LogUploader(component_manager)¶
run()¶
upload(filename)¶

Upload a single file to our serverside CGI script. Based on code by Jeff Bauer, Aaron Watters, Jim Fulton.
